title: Liz Truss
author: Liz Truss
content: Self care1. To everyone who has been through a lot but refuses to let it turn then cold, you deserve to be happy2. To everyone who walked away from something draining or one-sided....you deserve to be happy.3. To everyone who created their own closure without the apology they deserve .. You deserve to be happy.4. Please be gentle with yourself, you have already been through so much.5.  If you're a giver, please learn your limit because the takers don't have any.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I agree everyone in life deserves to be happy because it is good for your mental health. And being happy is also good for you because your attitude and approach to things in life will have positive results. If you start your day being sad, mad, or angry that can be very stressful. It will not allow you to clearly think or do something right. Take for example something so simple as driving to work. If you do not have a good meal this will cause you to have hunger. Now if you are already running late for work and traffic is bad. You will not be going to work with a happy approach or attitude. But by waking up early, having a proper meal can help you to have a happy attitude and start your day with positivity. Another good example is being happy in a good relationship. This is so important because if you are not in a healthy relationship, it can cost you your mental health and happiness. Having the right partner in a relationship matters a lot because both of you want to be happy. Toxic relationships are bad for anyone because you may be giving your time and love to someone who does not appreciate you or even your money.

comments.author: nicolas222
comments.body: There are many resources that suggest that everyone deserves to be happy. Inspirational quotes, articles on psychology, and scientific studies all support the idea that happiness is a fundamental human right. Additionally, being happy can have a positive impact on others and the community. It is important to prioritize self-care and self-love in order to achieve happiness and fulfillment in life.
